00035 // Preprocessor macro, bleah.. Forced to use this instead of static constant as a quick workaround 
00036 // to a gcc 4.2 build error. Think of a better solution in the future.
00037 #define OMEGA_MAX_EVENTS 1024

00039 namespace omega
00040 {
00041         // Forward declarations.
00042         class SystemManager;

00044         typedef Service* (*ServiceAllocator)();
00045         typedef Dictionary<String, ServiceAllocator> ServiceAllocatorDictionary;
00046         typedef Dictionary<String, Service*> ServiceDictionary;
00047 
00049         class OMEGA_API ServiceManager
00050         {
00051         friend class Service;
00052 
00053         public:
00054                 // Class constructor.
00055                 ServiceManager(SystemManager* sys);
00056 
00057                 // Class destructor
00058                 ~ServiceManager();
00059 
00060                 void registerService(String svcName, ServiceAllocator creationFunc);
00061 
00064                 ServiceAllocator findServiceAllocator(String svcName);
00065 
00066                 // Add a new input service to the manager.
00067                 void addService(Service* svc);
00068                 void removeService(Service* svc);
00069                 Service* findService(String svcName);
00070                 template<typename T> T* findService(String svcName);
00071 
00072                 // initialize
00073                 void setup(Setting& settings);
00074                 void initialize();
00075                 void start();
00076                 void stop();
00077                 void dispose();
00078 
00079                 void poll();
00080 
00081                 int getAvailableEvents() { return myAvailableEvents; }
00082                 int getDroppedEvents() { return myDroppedEvents; }
00083                 void resetDroppedEvents() { myDroppedEvents = 0; }
00084                 int getEvents(Event* ptr, int maxEvents);
00085                 Event* getEvent(int index);
00086                 void clearEvents();
00087                 void lockEvents();
00088                 void unlockEvents();
00089 
00090         public:
00091                 // The maximum number of events stored in the event buffer.
00092                 static const int MaxEvents;
00093         
00094         private:
00095                 int incrementBufferIndex(int index);
00096                 int decrementBufferIndex(int index);
00097                 Event* writeHead();
00098                 Event* readHead();
00099                 Event* readTail();
00100 
00101         private:
00102                 SystemManager*  mySys;
00103 
00104                 // The service registry.
00105                 ServiceAllocatorDictionary myServiceRegistry;
00106 
00107                 // Dictionary of active services
00108                 ServiceDictionary myServices;
00109 
00110                 // Event buffer stuff.
00111                 Lock*  myEventBufferLock;
00112                 Event*          myEventBuffer;
00113                 int                             myEventBufferHead;
00114                 int                             myEventBufferTail;
00115 
00116                 int myAvailableEvents;
00117                 int myDroppedEvents;
00118         };
00119 
00121         inline Service* ServiceManager::findService(String svcName)
00122         {
00123                 ServiceDictionary::const_iterator elem = myServices.find(svcName);
00124                 if(elem == myServices.end()) return NULL;
00125                 return elem->second;
00126         }
00127 
00129         template<typename T> inline T* ServiceManager::findService(String svcName)
00130         {
00131                 return (T*)findService(svcName);
00132         }
00133 }; // namespace omega
00134 
00135 #endif
